content: अपोह् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> [अप-उह् or ऊह्] {@--1@} To remove, drive or push away, dispel, take away, destroy; स हि विघ्नानपोहति <ls>Ś. 3. 1</ls>; कुसुमानि… प्रभवंत्यायुरपोहितुं यदि <ls>R. 8. 44</ls>, <ls n="R. 8.">54</ls>; पूर्वमुत्सवमपौहदुत्सवः (उत्तरः) <ls n="R.">19. 5</ls> pushed away, displaced, supplanted; <ls>V. 3. 10</ls>; अकिंचिदपि कुर्वाणः सौख्यैर्दुःखान्यपोहति <ls>U. 2. 19</ls> removes; <ls>Bk. 17. 83</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">15. 119</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 414</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 108</ls>; कल्पनाया अपोढः कल्पनापोढः <ls>P. II. 1. 38</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls> removed from, or beyond, imagination. {@--2@} To heal, cure (as illness). {@--3@} To avoid, give up, leave; <ls>Ms. 10. 86</ls>; पंचवट्यां ततो रामः… अनपोढस्थितिस्तस्थौ <ls>R. 12. 31</ls> not leaving (the path of) propriety. {@--4@} To deny; स्थाप्यतेऽपोह्यते वा चेत् <ls>S. D. 730.</ls> {@--5@} To reason, argue by way of opposing a statement.
